bean.name: JdbcMessageIdRepository
bean.title: Jdbc Message Id Repository
bean.description: Idempotent repository that uses a SQL database to store message ids.

tableName.description: The name of the table to use in the database

createTableIfNotExists.description: Whether to create the table in the database if none exists on startup

tableExistsString.label: advanced
tableExistsString.description: SQL query to use for checking if table exists

createString.label: advanced
createString.description: SQL query to use for creating table

queryString.label: advanced
queryString.description: SQL query to use for check if message id already exists

insertString.label: advanced
insertString.description: SQL query to use for inserting a new message id in the table

deleteString.label: advanced
deleteString.description: SQL query to use for deleting message id from the table

clearString.label: advanced
clearString.description: SQL query to delete all message ids from the table

processorName.description: The name of the processor that are used for this repository. Use unique names to separate processors in the same database.

jdbcTemplate.description: The Spring JdbcTemplate to use for connecting to the database

transactionTemplate.description: The Spring TransactionTemplate to use for connecting to the database
